wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Hall (29 May 1935 – 10 August 2019), known as 'Mike', was an English cricketer. Hall was a right-handed batsman.

response: Mike or Michael Hall may refer to:
*Anthony Michael Hall (Michael Anthony Hall, born 1968), American actor
*Michael Hall, 84, English cricketer (Nottinghamshire).Emotional tributes paid to 'loving' dad and 'cricket champion'
